Description.Name: Hotel Alert
Description.Text: No Executive Lounge access for guests under 18 years after 4pm. Airport pick-up requires 24-hr advance notice to hotel.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 1
Description.Text: Our Cairo hotel near Maadi is close to Heliopolis, Cairo International Airport and business areas.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 2
Description.Text: While in Cairo, don't miss the chance to explore ancient Egypt or shop at khan el khalili Bazaar.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 3
Description.Text: Cairo Festival City is a visionary mixed community and a state-of-the-art super regional center.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 4
Description.Text: Porto Cairo, the most desirable location with distinctive recreational and commercial facilities.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 5
Description.Text: Right in the heart of New Cairo now lies a multi-function complex & city center, The Downtown Mall.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 1
Description.Text: Enjoy over 18 meeting rooms and 800 square meter exhibition space for your next Cairo conference.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 2
Description.Text: Use our professional high tech audio-visual equipment for your event near the Convention Center.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 3
Description.Text: Keep connected with wireless, high-speed Internet throughout our Cairo, Egypt, hotelâ€™s meeting area.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 4
Description.Text: Stay comfortable in our hotel's Executive Lounge space, perfect for working during a business trip.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 5
Description.Text: Our hotel's business center is open 7 a.m. - 11 p.m.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 6
Description.Text: Unwind with our hotel's 27-hole golf course, health center, Mandara Spa and indoor and outdoor pool.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 1
Description.Text: Choose our hotel in Cairo, Egypt as the place for your wedding, reception and other special events.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 2
Description.Text: Select our Tutankhamun wedding venue in Cairo, Egypt for up to 2,000 of your cherished event guests.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 3
Description.Text: Choose the lovely Cheops and Chephren ballrooms as the ideal setting for your wedding in Cairo.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 4
Description.Text: Enjoy our superb catering teams and professional planning services for your Cairo, Egypt wedding.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 5
Description.Text: Tell your overnight guests about our preferential rates when attending weddings in Cairo, Egypt.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 6
Description.Text: Use our Heliopolis, Cairo wedding venue, which includes a babysitting service, spa, golf and dining.

Description.Name: Description
Description.Text: Located in the heart of Cairo, the luxurious JW Marriott Hotel Cairo features spacious rooms, stunning bedding, wireless internet, themed Water Park, championship Golf Course, Health Center, Mandara Thai Spa, and a choice of 12 international restaurants.

Description.Name: Property Description Long
Description.Text: Indulge yourself with a relaxing stay at the JW Marriott Hotel Cairo in Cairo, Egypt. It is the perfect place to discover the magic of Cairo, a vibrant city steeped in 7,000 years of history and culture. Our award-winning hotel provides a combination of relaxed elegance and personalized service, where guests can enjoy a luxurious stay at the only five star hotel in Cairo. Located seven minutes from impressive Heliopolis, Cairo International Airport and 30 minutes from the downtown area, our Cairo hotelâ€™s accommodations consist of 440 luxurious guest rooms, including 84 suites that feature stunning views of our championship golf course or "The Beach." Savor the selection of 12 international dining options and prepare your senses for a memorable culinary experience. Do not forget to visit our Cairo hotel spa at the prestigious 27,000-square foot Mandara Spa with more than 30 exotic treatments and an expansive choice of rooms and suites. Enjoy a luxurious getaway at the JW Marriott Hotel Cairo in Cairo, Egypt.

Description.Name: Sales Message
Description.Text: JW Marriott Hotel Cairo is nestled in the prestigious Heliopolis area, just 7 minutes from Cairo's International Airport and close to attractions. The hotel offers a complimentary shuttle bus services to and from the airport, as well as daily shuttle bus.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 1
Description.Text: Experience our luxurious hotel amenities, including a health center, golf, a water park, Mandara Spa and 12 restaurants.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 2
Description.Text: Let our luxury hotel escort you to Cairo Festival City Mall and The Egyptian Museum. Our shuttle runs daily for your convenience.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 3
Description.Text: Enjoy complimentary WiFi in public areas at our luxury hotel in Cairo, Egypt. It's a courtesy for you.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 1
Description.Text: Experience stunning views of the golf course or the beach from our 5-star hotel's lovely balconies.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 2
Description.Text: Take advantage of the 5 star hotel's 440 rooms luxurious amenities and breathtaking views.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 3
Description.Text: Enjoy our Cairo hotel's spacious desk and comfortable chairs while you relaxing in your 5 star room.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 4
Description.Text: Use our hotel's deep soaking tubs, separate showers, lavish bathrobes, slippers, tea and coffee.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 5
Description.Text: Each room is equipped with safety deposit boxes, irons/ironing boards, hair dryers and mini bars.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 6
Description.Text: Stay connected from our Cairo, Egypt hotel with Internet access and three telephones in our rooms.

Description.ListItem: Experience stunning views of the golf course or the beach from our 5-star hotel's lovely balconies.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Indulge in international cuisine at one of our restaurants in Cairo, Egypt. This cafÃ© overlooks the golf course and lakes, providing spectacular and relaxing views with every meal. Treat yourself and your travel companions to great menu items any time.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Enjoy the best Australian beef and succulent steak with delicious sides at one of the most exquisite Cairo restaurants. JWâ€™s Steakhouse is best known for creating an evening that youâ€™ll wish to repeat over and over again.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Experience one of the leading restaurants in Cairo. We serve authentic Japanese sushi, sashimi and maki in a lovely space, featuring scenic views of the golf course and lakes. Take your cultural experience to the next level when you dine at the Sushi Bar.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Our flavorful, Mediterranean restaurant will delight your taste buds. Every dish is arranged to satisfy both your eyes and your appetite. Reserve a night in our Cairo restaurant location today.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Experience live entertainment as you dine on the best Italian pizza and pasta in Cairo. Cucina is known for its authentic cuisine and spirited atmosphere. We delight in bringing you great food and the finest service of any restaurants in Cairo, Egypt.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Tempt yourself with a fine array of sweets, sandwiches, tea and coffee at our Cairo restaurant. Take time to satisfy your sweet cravings, enjoy a delightful snack, sit down for a satisfying meal or simply to recharge with perfectly brewed coffee and tea.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Indulge your senses at The Cactus Bar, a sophisticated sports bar offering superior service and a great menu. Our American cuisine is available any time of the day with a variety of tempting selections to choose from for any meal at our Cairo restaurant.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Enjoy barbecue and fresh juices in our outdoor summer retreat near lovely golf course and lakes. Experience a laid back dining experience infused with flavor at one of the best Bar-B-Q restaurants in Cairo, Egypt. Each dish is cooked perfectly for you.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Explore our Cairo restaurant's snacks, sandwiches and a special "pool-friendly" menu. Sit back, relax and slip into vacation-mode while poolside with friends and family. Weâ€™ll delight you with delicious options from our menu. Treat yourself this summer.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Enter the world of fine cigars and aged whiskies. Havana Just cigar is open from 6 p.m. to midnight daily and is the perfect place to delight in the conversation of your company and the allure of the finest cigars. Enjoy a genuinely relaxing night.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Enjoy cocktails and high tea in a breathtaking setting. This Cairo restaurant is open 24 hours, giving you the option to dine in great company any time you crave. Come in with friends before, during or after a fun-filled night out in the vibrant area.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Indulge in mouthwatering dishes from Hong Kong, Thailand, Singapore and the mainland of China. We've got every selection, from the most familiar to the most adventurous dishes. Try an old favorite done right, or expand your horizons and try something new.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Sample fresh pasta, ravioli and gelato at The Italian Piazza for a taste of old-world charm. On Fridays and Saturdays, diners can enjoy live music while they fill their stomachs with classic favorites with good company. Stop in today for a bite to eat.

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: From Cairo International Airport, follow the airport exit signs leading out on to the Ring Road. Continue driving till you see the JW Marriott located on your left hand side on the opposite side of the ring road. Take the exit sign posted Police Academy doing a U turn on the roundabout to be on the opposite site of the road. Continue driving down the road till you locate the JW on your right hand side.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Mandara Spa Valentine's Day Special Offer

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Celebrate the beauty of your love in memorable style with an exquisite Valentineâ€™s Day experience at Mandara Spa.For reservation, call 2406 5890 or via email on mhrs.caijw.mandara.spa@marriotthotels.com

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Valentine's Day at JW Marriott Hotel Cairo

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Revive the romance with your loved one on Valentineâ€™s Day. Celebrate the love of your life in an extraordinary setting like on other at one of our signature venues and enjoy a sensational table set up and a red rose to your gorgeous lady.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Let the JW Marriott Cairo be your perfect escape for a luxurious Valentineâ€™s experience and discover our tempting room package.For more information, please contact our reservations department via reservations.jwcairo@marriotthotels.com

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Let your mom feel special with a day of pampering at Mandara Spa at JW Marriott Cairo. Treat her to a rejuvenating Hammam Royal Ritual followed by a relaxing 50 minute aromatic massage. For reservations, please contact our Mandara Spa team on 2406 5890.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: With Mother's Day just around the corner, now is the time to start thinking about that special day. Spoil your mom with an international brunch or dinner buffet at Mirage Cafe and enjoy the stunning performance of our live band.For reservations, please contact Mirage cafe restaurant on 2406 5844.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Enjoy the magic of Eid Al Fitr in the Mirage City sanctuary and delve into the gift of luxury with our special room packages. For more information and reservations, please contact our reservations team on 2406 5777 or via email reservations.jwcairo@marriotthotels.com

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Eid Festivities at JW Marriott Cairo

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: @Mirage CafÃ©Spoil your family over a festive Eid lunch and let our Chefs tempt you with an extravagant Seafood buffet at Mirage CafÃ©@The BeachCelebrate a special Eid this year under the warm sun, with a savory BBQ menu, various kidsâ€™ activities with the uplifting tunes of our live DJ

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Dive into a generous brunch and dinner international buffets at JW Marriott Cairo, laid out for your delight and celebrate Eid Al Adha in style.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Create your own private and luxurious Valentineâ€™s Day retreat with our tempting package: One night double accommodation Breakfast for two at Mirage CafÃ© Set menu dinner for two at Ahlein, Lemongrass or Cucina Late checkout - 8:00 pmFor reservations, call 20 2 24115588

Description.Name: Renovation description
Description.Text: JW Marriott Cairo has recently presented Tutankhamun to a newly evolved sense of luxury after receiving new carpeting, wall panels as well as the creation of a diversified and sophisticated world class menu, guaranteed to suit each and every taste.

Description.Name: Sales strategy
Description.Text: Ideal group size is 100 rooms, 3nights, with meeting requirements. Group focus and flexibility on rates for Friday/Saturday (weekend in Egypt) and the entire month of Ramadan (28th June 2014 to 27th July 2014). Focus on government, embassies and ministers as there will be increase travel to Egypt following increased stability. Ideal for international cycle meetings, particularly for pharmaceutical companies. One-stop-shop resort. Strong reputation in the marketplace for convention facilities and seamless events. Facilities include, man made beach, wave pool, swimming pools (indoor outdoor), five star Thai spa, 27 hole championship golf course and 12 F&B outlets. Looking to accommodate international airline crews that value safety, security, world class service, convenient and accessible location. Only 10 minutes away from the airport. Targeting airline crews that can afford to pay for quality.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: Need period for groups and conference business.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: It is Ramadan, need period for group, special corporate and conferences business as we are targeting occupancy. Iftars and sohours are high.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: We are targeting high rated groups and transient. High demand season for weddings.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: We are targeting high rated groups and transient.

Description.Name: Seasonality description
Description.Text: Easter period. This is a need period for groups and transient.

Description.Name: Value proposition 1
Description.Text: JW Marriott Hotel Cairo nestled in the prestigious Heliopolis district just 7 minutes from Cairo International Airport. It's Cairo's only corporate resort offering a unique combination of relaxed elegance with gracious and personalized service.

Description.Name: Value proposition 2
Description.Text: JW Marriott Hotel Cairo an ultimate travel destination in and of itself. Our 438 elegantly appointed guest rooms acclaimed as the most spacious in the city. It's also stirred up the local culinary scene with 12 restaurants and bars.

Description.Name: Value proposition 3
Description.Text: Our 27-hole championship golf course challenges golfers of all skill levels. The state-of the-art Health Center offers a haven of recreational facilities. The unique Mandara Spa, a paramount of tranquility and relaxation offers 30 exotic treatments.

Description.Name: Value proposition 4
Description.Text: JW Marriott Hotel Cairo invites you to taste the pharaohs' civilization and history of old Cairo. Come and let us be your guide through 7,000 years of history. Our concierge team provides local attractions tours and complimentary shuttle buses.

Description.Name: Value proposition 5
Description.Text: JW Marriott Hotel Cairo boasts one of the largest banqueting ballrooms offering Cairo's most comprehensive and advanced meeting facilities to deliver a productive and successful outcome to all executive guests.

Description.Name: Is this golf club managed by Marriott Golf?
Golf Description
Description.Text: An oasis of tranquility carved out of Cairo, JW Marriott's Mirage City Golf Club in Cairo offers one of the most rewarding golf resort experiences in the Middle East. This award-winning, beautifully landscaped, 27-hole championship golf course will challe
